choose.when: select no, title, contents, reg_date as regDate, category_no as categoryNo from post where no = ( select max(no) from post where category_no=( select min(no) from category where blog_id = '박정욱'));
choose.otherwise: select no, title, contents, reg_date as regDate, category_no as categoryNo from post where no = ( select max(no) from post where category_no=${categoryNo })

choose.when: select no, title, contents, reg_date as regDate, category_no as categoryNo from post where category_no in (select min(no) from category where blog_id = #{id }) and no != #{postNo } order by no desc
choose.otherwise: select no, title, contents, reg_date as regDate, category_no as categoryNo from post where no != #{postNo } and category_no = #{categoryNo } order by no desc
